48 namespace Mutation {
49  namespace Kinetics {
50 
55 class RateLawGroup
56 {
57 public:
58 
62  RateLawGroup() : m_last_t(-1.0) {}
63 
67  virtual ~RateLawGroup() { };
68 
72  virtual void addRateCoefficient(
73  const size_t rxn, const RateLaw* const p_rate) = 0;
74 
79  void addReaction(const size_t rxn, const Reaction& reaction) {
80  m_reacs.addReaction(rxn, reaction.reactants());
81  m_prods.addReaction(rxn, reaction.products());
82  }
83 
88  double getT() const { return m_t; }
89 
93  virtual void lnk(
94  const Thermodynamics::StateModel* const p_state, double* const p_lnk) = 0;
95 
100  void subtractLnKeq(size_t ns, double* const p_g, double* const p_r) const
101  {
102  // Compute G_i/RT - ln(Patm/RT)
103  const double val = std::log(ONEATM / (RU * m_t));
104  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
105  p_g[i] -= val;
106 
107  // Now subtract \Delta[G_i/RT - ln(Patm/RT)]_j
108  m_reacs.decrReactions(p_g, p_r);
109  m_prods.incrReactions(p_g, p_r);
110  }
111 
112 
113 protected:
114 
117  double m_t;
118  double m_last_t;
119 
122  StoichiometryManager m_reacs;
123 
126  StoichiometryManager m_prods;
127 };
128 
129 
135 template <typename RateLawType, typename TSelectorType>
136 class RateLawGroup1T : public RateLawGroup
137 {
138 public:
139 
143  virtual void addRateCoefficient(
144  const size_t rxn, const RateLaw* const p_rate)
145  {
146  m_rates.push_back(
147  std::make_pair(rxn, dynamic_cast<const RateLawType&>(*p_rate))
148  );
149  }
150 
154  virtual void lnk(
155  const Thermodynamics::StateModel* const p_state, double* const p_lnk)
156  {
157  // Determine the reaction temperature for this group
158  m_t = TSelectorType().getT(p_state);
159 
160  // Update only if the temperature has changed
161  //if (std::abs(m_t - m_last_t) > 1.0e-10) {
162  const double lnT = std::log(m_t);
163  const double invT = 1.0 / m_t;
164 
165  for (int i = 0; i < m_rates.size(); ++i) {
166  const std::pair<size_t, RateLawType>& rate = m_rates[i];
167  p_lnk[rate.first] = rate.second.getLnRate(lnT, invT);
168  }
169  //}
170 
171  // Save this temperature
172  m_last_t = m_t;
173  }
174 
175 private:
176 
178  std::vector< std::pair<size_t, RateLawType> > m_rates;
179 };
180 
181 
186 struct CompareTypeInfo {
187  bool operator ()(const std::type_info* a, const std::type_info* b) const {
188  return a->before(*b);
189  }
190 };
191 
192 
197 class RateLawGroupCollection
198 {
199 public:
200 
201  typedef std::map<const std::type_info*, RateLawGroup*, CompareTypeInfo>
202  GroupMap;
203 
207  ~RateLawGroupCollection()
208  {
209  GroupMap::iterator iter = m_group_map.begin();
210  for ( ; iter != m_group_map.end(); ++iter) {
211  delete iter->second;
212  iter->second = NULL;
213  }
214  }
215 
219  size_t nGroups() const { return m_group_map.size(); }
220 
224  const GroupMap& groups() const { return m_group_map; }
225 
229  template <typename GroupType>
230  void addRateCoefficient(const size_t rxn, const RateLaw* const p_rate)
231  {
232  if (m_group_map[&typeid(GroupType)] == NULL)
233  m_group_map[&typeid(GroupType)] = new GroupType();
234  m_group_map[&typeid(GroupType)]->addRateCoefficient(rxn, p_rate);
235  }
236 
241  template <typename GroupType>
242  void addReaction(const size_t rxn, const Reaction& reaction)
243  {
244  if (m_group_map[&typeid(GroupType)] == NULL)
245  m_group_map[&typeid(GroupType)] = new GroupType();
246  m_group_map[&typeid(GroupType)]->addReaction(rxn, reaction);
247  }
248 
253  void logOfRateCoefficients(
254  const Thermodynamics::StateModel* const p_state, double* const p_lnk)
255  {
256  // Compute the forward rate constants
257  GroupMap::iterator iter = m_group_map.begin();
258  for ( ; iter != m_group_map.end(); ++iter)
259  iter->second->lnk(p_state, p_lnk);
260  }
261 
265  void subtractLnKeq(
266  const Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo, double* const p_g,
267  double* const p_lnk)
268  {
269  const size_t ns = thermo.nSpecies();
270  GroupMap::iterator iter = m_group_map.begin();
271  for ( ; iter != m_group_map.end(); ++iter) {
272  const RateLawGroup* p_group = iter->second;
273  thermo.speciesSTGOverRT(p_group->getT(), p_g);
274  p_group->subtractLnKeq(ns, p_g, p_lnk);
275  }
276  }
277 
278 private:
279 
281  GroupMap m_group_map;
282 };
283 
284  } // namespace Kinetics
285 } // namespace Mutation
